Please update newest version to experience our app. Thanks I agree and go to update Ask me later Please check internet connection Retry No Internet Connection DO YOU LIKE OUR APP? Maybe Later Press again to exit Setting Welcome Back Update Flash Alert Flash Light Guide Setting Hello blank fragment Status: On Turn On For Incoming Calls Turn On For SMS Turn On For & Notification On time Off time Normal Vibrate Silent seconds Flash is on.Press the \'\'OFF\'\' button to stop STATUS SPEED Test Request permissions For the flash to work you need to give camera and phone access. This permission does not affect the phone at all so please rest assured OK Stop Installing... Flash call installation successful! TRY IT Incoming Call.... Accept Reject Install successfully Please allow notification access. You need to grant Notification Access to enalble this feature. FlashLight Notification Rules Status: Off ADVANCED Do not flash the flash while the screen is on Save Battery Turn off flash when battery is low Policy Share How to remove this application from the restricted list of power Why this app not flashing or not flashing sometimes How to avoid accidentally closing this app? What permissions does this app require? How to remove this application from the restriced list of power saving features on the phone? Why this app not flashing or not flashing sometimes? What permissions does this app require? General guide: 1. This application was accidentally

2. On some phones, the phone\'s battery optimizer did not allow the app to run in the background, causing this app to stop working.

3. When the phone indicats low battery level and you activate the power saving feature, this application may stop working. \n4. When you shutdown and restart your phone, on some devices this app may not be able to restart itself.

5. In any case, when this application is closed and not working, you just need to reopen this application. Locking this app on the multitasking manager can make this app work better, keep it active all the time, avoid this app being closed accidentally (disabled and inoperable). Call management: Enable this permission, when you having incoming calls, we can flash to notify you

Notifications: Enable this permission so that we can notify battery status Background running: Enable this permission to keep the flash of incoming call and battery detection working stably

Notification Access: Enable this permission so that we can flash when you receive messages from other applications

Display Permission: Enable this permission so that we can show notifications appear on the top of screen

Camera Access: Enable this permission so that flashlight can work normally. Alarm flash blinks on call, flashlight NEXT THANK YOU! Thank you for using our App. Would you to post your review on store. This will help and motivate us a lot. See you soon! Turn on the camera and flash light simultaneously Turn on flashlight in off screen mode > Background restriction > Battery - Go to:Phone setting ->Select OFF or Unrestricted
